item.title: Introduction to the Service Workers
item.description: This post discusses about a web platform specification, that aims to provide a programmatic control over web pages, by providing a user driven api, which can be used for many purposes like; to cache data for offline usage, control outgoing network requests, provide a platform for implementing push notifcations, and for making a progressive web app. Currently, I am working with Mozilla Research, on implementing the foundations for the service worker specification in Servo Browser engine as part of my Gsoc project (mentored by Josh).
